description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, and the fathomer can’t constrict another target.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Shapechanger (2/Day). The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious} or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to &Reference[poison]{poison} damage, as well as resistance to &Reference[fire]{fire} damage and &Reference[bludgeoning]{bludgeoning}, &Reference[piercing]{piercing}, and &Reference[slashing]{slashing} damage from nonmagical weapons. It also has immunity to the following conditions: &Reference[exhaustion]{exhaustion}, &Reference[grappled]{grappled}, &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed}, &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned}, &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, &Reference[prone]{prone}, &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious}. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Olhydra’s Armor (Human Form Only). The fathomer can cast mage armor at will, without expending &Reference[material]{material} components.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Spellcasting (Human Form Only). The fathomer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is &Reference[cha]{Charisma} (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has two 3rd-level spell slots, which it regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following warlock spells:

Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, mage hand

1st level: armor of Agathys, expeditious retreat, hex

2nd level: invisibility

3rd level: vampiric touch

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical &Reference[force]{force} surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature to assail it with the chill of the grave. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 &Reference[necrotic]{necrotic} damage, and it can't regain hit points until the start of your next turn. Until then, the hand clings to the target.

If you hit an &Reference[undead]{undead} target, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 &Reference[force]{force} damage.

The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical &Reference[force]{force} surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.
This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.

A creature you touch becomes &Reference[invisible]{invisible} until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is &Reference[invisible]{invisible} as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

materials.value: an eyelash encased in gum arabic

description.value:
The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life &Reference[force]{force} from others to heal your wounds. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 &Reference[necrotic]{necrotic} damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of &Reference[necrotic]{necrotic} damage dealt. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as an action.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

system.chatFlavor: [healing] Equal to half the necrotic damage dealt

description.chatFlavor: [healing] Equal to half the necrotic damage dealt
